title: Set up Landlord-Tenant Agreement
description: A landlord wants to set up an agreement where the utility service for a rental property automatically reverts to their name when a tenant moves out.

tasks.description: Identify the landlord's account and the specific rental property address.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent correctly identifies the relevant account and service address.

tasks.description: Explain the terms of the automatic reversion agreement.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent clearly communicates how the process works.

tasks.description: Process the agreement form and link the landlord's account to the service address.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully sets up the reversion agreement in the system.
